name: Design of Steel Structures
descrp: Behavior and design of structural members and connections using Load and Resistance Factor Design (LRFD) methods: tension members, compression members, beams and beam-columns; typical shear and moment connections, welded and bolted. Behavior and characteristics of steel structural systems. A term project is assigned to conduct the design of a steel building structure, including resistance to earthquake loads. Laboratory includes problem-solving sessions and actual testing of steel components.
